ygData.subject: Killed Me
ygData.msgSnippet:
I had never played either a High Elf or a Paladin before so I thought I d
try one. At level 5 I was sitting and fishing at the bottom of the steps at
the dock
ygData.messageBody:
I had never played either a High Elf or a Paladin before so I thought I'd
try one. At level 5 I was sitting and fishing at the bottom of the steps at
the dock in Qetnos. Den Megason started attacking me and called the guards
who killed me before I could do anything. I always fished there with my
other characters. Is this because of being High Elf?

Paksenarryon (High Elf Paladin) - Morell Thule
Vickel (Wood Elf Ranger) - Morell Thule
Sshaer (Vah Shir Beastlord) - Morell Thule -"Till shade is gone, till water
is gone, into the Shadow with teeth bared, screaming defiance with the last
breath."
Sumdumfrog (Froglok Shaman) - Morell Thule - "Frogloks don't die, we just
croak and hop away."
Zabbenya (Gnome Cleric) - Morell Thule
